data.text:
family of six in one bedroom sounds a bit messy, but Bird House manage to be prepare for it. Within the room is manageable to move around and if needed there's two services on the corridor. 
Kitchen-wise, not the best for such a group but there's always all the good restaurants around the area.
data.title: practical hostel

data.text: I was disappointed. Not clean, I felt uncomfortable using the shared bathrooms and kitchen, since they were not clean.. same with the room. There was no sign of breakfast anywhere, I have no idea where it was supposed to be? It is on a busy street so if you have open windows, its really noisy. Location is good though and the room is big. I would not go here again.
data.title: unclean

data.text: Be forewarned, the photos for this listing are much nicer than real life.  This property is a hostel with shared common areas and shared bathrooms.  As one would expect in a hostel, the towels are thin, the guests are noisy, the toilet paper needs constant replenishing, etc.  We selected the Bird House for its location (El Raval is great) and because we thought a bunk-bed room for the four of us would be fun and novel.  The room was quite small and not very clean.  Disappointing.
data.title: Okay accommodation in good location

data.text:
This is a lovely little hostel that is located approx 10 min walk from Las Ramblas. 

The pictures are very artistic and make the hostel look a lot nicer than it is however it is still a nice pleasant place to stay with all the amenities you could need.
data.title: Nice hostel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Figjam88! Thank you for your feedback. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us.
Hope to see you soon!
Greetings from BirdHouse Team!
owner_response.author: BirdHousehostel

data.text:
We went to â€˜The Bird Houseâ€™ in Barcelona for 4 nights. We just got checked in and looking for a room. We found it. We entered our room and unhappy with this room. We are NOT expected room as different shown from website. I feel like weâ€™re in the big brother because one of camera is watching us, following us wherever we go in the kitchen. A manager is spying on us. Next day, we go downstairs and saw a reception and a guy who staring me, like killing me into his eyes! He approached me and showed me a photo of air conditioning remote battery is missing. I told him itâ€™s not my fault. My daughter did NOT know anything and she played with this remote. Then I realise how did a manager enter my room?!?! This is so wrong. I realise this hotel is unsafe. Please do not bring your kids to that hotel!! I would say 0 out of 10!! Terrible service, terrible customers and we donâ€™t feel welcome here. 

Also my roommate is complaining when my daughter criesðŸ˜‚when sheâ€™s having a child she will understand! I couldnâ€™t give a damn, the important thing is sheâ€™s wanting a milk. Sorry guys! 

Trust me guys, do not go there I feel scared and being watched.
data.title: NIGHTMARE HOTEL!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear jonathanrJ1552XY! Thank you for your feedback.
We are a little surprise with your review, sorry you didnÂ´t have a good stay here.
In some of the common areas we have cameras for the safety of our guests, however in no case the camera "follow" our guests. Is common in places like hallways or restaurants, belive us, our manager was not "spying" you.
Again, we sorry you felt that way.
Kind regards!
owner_response.author: BirdHousehostel
